data.name: Secondary School Certificate (10th)
data.description: I completed my 10th standard with a focus on core subjects, which laid the groundwork for my future academic and extracurricular interests.

data.name: Higher Secondary Certificate (12th)
data.university: College: N. Wadia College, Pune. (State board)
data.description: I completed my 12th standard in the Science stream, gaining a strong foundation in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics, while also developing a passion for cricket.

data.name: Bachelor of Engineering(Mechanical)
data.description: I hold a Bachelor of Engineering in Mechanical Engineering, where I not only gained expertise in subjects related to mechanical engineering but also developed proficiency in C language through interactions with my computer science peers and teachers. Additionally, I acquired hands-on experience with industry-standard tools such as CATIA V5, AutoCAD, and SolidWorks.

data.name: Developer
data.description: Collaboratively engineered custom learning app using open-source LMS framework, ensuring code quality and innovation. Proactively addressed functional issues, delivering efficient back-end processing, and implemented creative development approaches to achieve project goals.
